title: Newark Mayor's Race Seen As A Referendum On Cory Booker
teaser: Residents in Newark, N.J., voted on Tuesday, closing a raucous mayoral campaign to replace Corey Booker, who is now a U.S. senator. Renee Montagne talks to Mark Bonamo of the website Politicker NJ.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
